name: The Adventures of Knight Boy
description:
Help Knightboy save the town of Somewhere! A weird disease has swept the land and left just Knightboy and Zoey aware. The rest of the kingdom seems to be over taken with a powerful urge to pace and moan. Knightboy and Zoey set out on an epic quest to get the cure from the castle and save Somewhere. 

This game is still in development. Please feel free to let me know what can be improved in the comments. Be on the lookout for updates!
